title: Creating HealthAs it Should Be
cleaned_text: Creating Health As it Should Be Functional Medicine? At Health Works Integrative Medicine, we are committed to helping you reach optimal health and vitality by identifying the unique underlying causes of disease and treating them. We practice a new model of medicine (Functional Medicine) that incorporates the best diagnostic tools and techniques from conventional medicine, as well as merging test and tools that help identify the critical imbalances that are the root of all illness. There is a big difference between normal and optimal. We are committed to creating the optimal you. What We Treat - Acne - Alzheimer's Disease and - Dementia - Arthritis - Asthma - ADD, ADHD - Autoimmune Diseases - Brain Health (focus, cognition, memory) - Cancer Prevention & Support - Chronic Fatigue - Chronic Sinusitis - Depression and Anxiety - Detoxification & Healing - Gut Health - Diabetes - Digestive Disorders (IBD, - IBS, GERD/Reflux) - Eczema/Psoriasis - Elevated Cholesterol - Environmental & Food - Allergies - Fatigue - Female Disorders (PMS, Menopause, Infertility, PCOS) - Fibromyalgia - Healthy Aging - Healthy Weight & Metabolism - Heart Health - Hormone Balance - Interstitial Cystitis - Low testosterone - Mercury & Heavy Metal - Toxicity - Metabolic Syndrome, Pre, Diabetes, Insulin Resistance - Migraines & Headaches - Multiple Sclerosis - Mold - Obesity - Osteoporosis - Parkinson's disease - Restless Leg Syndrome - Sleep/Insomnia - Thyroid & Adrenal Disorders Our Philosophy Health Works Integrative Medicine Hours: Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu 8 am to 5 pm. We are closed on Fridays.
